languages.text: "Теперь я вижу, что Азуриан благословил мой Путь, ибо в нашей реальности я встретила человека, обладающего могущественной и яркой душой, не поддавшейся скверне".
"Now I see that Asuryan has blessed my Path, for in this reality, I met a human with a powerful and radiant soul unyielding to corruption."
languages.original_text: "Теперь я вижу, что Азуриан благословил мой Путь, ибо в нашей реальности я встретила человека, обладающего могущественной и яркой душой, не поддавшейся скверне".

traits.locale_text: "Now I see that Asuryan has blessed my path, for in this reality, I met a human with a powerful and radiant soul that has not yielded to corruption."
"Now I see that Asuryan has blessed my path, for in this reality, I met a human with a powerful and radiant soul that has not yielded to corruption."
"Now I see that Asuryan has blessed my Path, for in this reality, I met a human with a powerful and radiant soul unyielding to corruption."
"Now I see that Asuryan has blessed my Path, for in this reality, I met a human with a powerful and radiant soul unyielding to corruption."
"Now I see that Asuryan has blessed my Path, for in this reality, I met a human with a powerful and radiant soul unyielding to corruption."
"Now I see that Asuryan has blessed my Path, for in this reality, I met a human with a powerful and radiant soul unyielding to corruption."

languages.text: «Ahora veo que Asuryan ha bendecido mi senda, pues en esta realidad he conocido a un{mf||a} human{mf|o|a} con un alma poderosa y radiante que no cede ante la corrupción».
languages.original_text: "Now I see that Asuryan has blessed my Path, for in this reality, I met a human with a powerful and radiant soul unyielding to corruption."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora veo que Asuryan ha bendecido mi senda, pues en esta realidad he conocido a un{mf||a} human{mf|o|a} con un alma poderosa y radiante que no cede ante la corrupción».

languages.text: « Je vois maintenant qu'Asuryan a béni ma Voie, car dans cette réalité, j'ai rencontré {mf|un humain|une humaine} à l'âme rayonnante qui ne saurait céder à la corruption. »
languages.original_text: "Now I see that Asuryan has blessed my Path, for in this reality, I met a human with a powerful and radiant soul unyielding to corruption."

traits.locale_text: « Je vois maintenant qu'Asuryan a béni ma Voie, car dans cette réalité, j'ai rencontré {mf|un humain|une humaine} à l'âme rayonnante qui ne saurait céder à la corruption. »

languages.text: 「ではアシュリアンは私の道を祝福してくれていたようだ。この世界では、私は腐敗にも屈しない、強く明るい魂を持った人間と出会ったのだから」
languages.original_text: "Now I see that Asuryan has blessed my Path, for in this reality, I met a human with a powerful and radiant soul unyielding to corruption."

traits.locale_text: 「ではアシュリアンは私の道を祝福してくれていたようだ。この世界では、私は腐敗にも屈しない、強く明るい魂を持った人間と出会ったのだから」

languages.text: “现在我明白了，阿苏焉确实保佑了我的道途。因为在这个世界中，我遇到的这个人类拥有强大而光辉的灵魂，绝不会自甘堕落。”
languages.original_text: "Now I see that Asuryan has blessed my Path, for in this reality, I met a human with a powerful and radiant soul unyielding to corruption."

traits.locale_text: “现在我明白了，阿苏焉确实保佑了我的道途。因为在这个世界中，我遇到的这个人类拥有强大而光辉的灵魂，绝不会自甘堕落。”

languages.text: "Nun sehe ich, dass Asuryan meinen Pfad gesegnet hat, denn in dieser Realität bin ich einem Menschen mit einer mächtigen und strahlenden Seele begegnet, die nicht anfällig für Korruption ist."
languages.original_text: "Now I see that Asuryan has blessed my Path, for in this reality, I met a human with a powerful and radiant soul unyielding to corruption."

traits.locale_text: "Nun sehe ich, dass Asuryan meinen Pfad gesegnet hat, denn in dieser Realität bin ich einem Menschen mit einer mächtigen und strahlenden Seele begegnet, die nicht anfällig für Korruption ist."
